TopicTitle: Certain Add-on for Certain Save file?

Articles.Content: So, I've installed a few add-ons that include parts, and now I've got a lot of parts. Is there anyway to only use specific addons for specific save-games? I have the filter thingy where you only see parts from specific add-ons, but I don't like it very much personally.

Sadely not, for now, mods are global, especially plug-ins, and parts can't be enable/disable on demand per savegame.

The only way to do this is to use multiple KSP installs, each one with different set if mods.
